channel.title: Server will not work with No-IP . Only works as localhost. Teamviewer for +rep!
channel.description: I need help from somebody because I cannot get my server to work with my client through IP's. I tried using a No-IP, as well as my actual IP... To no avail. I can only get the server to work on my client with localhost (127.0.0.1). [size=24pt]I WILL +REP 10 OR MORE DEPENDING ON THE WORK TOWARDS ANYONE WHO HELPS ME VIA TEAMVIEWER!!!![/size] Thanks!!

item.title: Server will not work with No-IP . Only works as localhost. Teamviewer for +rep!
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

If your useing PI or hybrid pvp or whatever client, make sure the ip is set at your ip not the no-ip but just the numbers ex: 555.555.555.555

Read full topic
item.source: Server will not work with No-IP . Only works as localhost. Teamviewer for +rep!
